# qqboxplot

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The qqboxplot package implements q-q boxplots as an extension to ggplot2.  

## Installation

[CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) installation coming soon.

The most recent version of qqboxplot can be installed from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jrodu/qqboxplot")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(qqboxplot)
## basic example code
```
